plot: A young medical student returns to his Tyrolean home to find out that Napoleon's troops have taken over the area and that his mother and sister have been murdered.
title: Der Rebell
plot_es: A young medical student returns to his Tyrolean home to find out that Napoleon's troops have taken over the area and that his mother and sister have been murdered.
plot_en: A young medical student returns to his Tyrolean home to find out that Napoleon's troops have taken over the area and that his mother and sister have been murdered.

cast.role: Kapitän Leroy, Oberkommandant von St. Vigil
cast.name: Victor Varconi
